message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $170. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $150 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $160?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I would like to counter with $140 for the product. I hope this meets in the middle for us.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Let's settle this - I'll come down to $155, my final offer.
